title: Lauren Goodger's impossibly peachy bum threatens to burst out of her bikini
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Former TOWIE star Lauren Goodger , 33, has flaunted her impossible bum during her sun-soaked trip to Marbella on Tuesday.

The brunette bombshell barely contained her eye-popping assets as she posed up a storm on her recent holiday.

The reality star left little to the imagination as she nailed an eye-popping look and posed for photographers in a tiny neon bikini.

The Essex babe flaunted her surgically enhanced curves in a scantily clad, neon green two-piece while working on her perfectly golden tan in sun-drenched Marbella.

(Image: BACKGRID)

(Image: BACKGRID)

The TV bombshell was nearly bursting out of the plunging cropped top as she soaked up Spain's sunshine and displayed the results of numerous boob jobs.

To match, Lauren wore equally tiny stringed-thong bottoms which scarcely covered her modesty while she strutted about at the lavish poolside setting.

Lauren seductively posed around the pool and drew attention to her extremely peachy oiled-up bum as she carefully placed her beach towel on a sun-lounger.

(Image: BACKGRID)

(Image: BACKGRID)

The brunette beauty kept her daytime look glamorous as she added heavy make-up and arranged her glossy locks in a perfectly blow-dried fashion.

The star shielded her face from the sun with a pair of oversized designer sunglasses however, she ensured her extremely plump pout was on full display with lashings of lipgloss.

With her curves causing such a stir, it is little wonder fan have raised the question about her bum - which she has always insisted is all natural.

Lauren's latest saucy snap comes after she claimed that she had not had fillers in two years.

(Image: BACKGRID)

(Image: BACKGRID)

However, Lauren appeared to have changed her mind last month as she expressed her desire to have "full-blown surgery" .

In the past, the star admitted to undergoing a nose job, boob job, liposuction to rid her of 'lumps and bumps' and fillers, shortly after rising to fame on The Only Way Is Essex in 2010.

Lauren continued to surgically sculpt her image when she had a boob job to take her from a 34D cup to a 34E cup in 2014.

In September, the former TOWIE icon confessed to Closer magazine that she still "hates" her body image and opened up about the pressure to look good all the time.

She told the magazine: "I hate my body, I hate it. I want to get surgery.

"I want full-blown surgery. I want it all sucked out and I want to be little. I want to be skinny.

(Image: BACKGRID)

The star continues to regularly come under fire for editing and filtering her social media snaps.

However, on Instagram this summer the star told her supporters not to believe rumours.

She said: "Please don’t take notice of press and how I look compared to real life – it’s just a story and pantomime.

"I don’t have surgeries. 2017 was the last time I had anything done and I wouldn’t do to my face… anything I would do I’ll always say."
description: The former TOWIE star flaunted her surgically-enhanced assets during her sun-soaked holiday in Marbella
